messages.message:
I’m struggling to get any data out of this document, i’ve got object detection on, and other arabic documents are working well. Is there any suggestion to improve the extraction here?

@Hari - not sure if this is an OCR issue or not, as when I ask for all the text it can find it, it just can’t get all the text and get me the data at the same time
Looks like an OCR issue! Can you pls share the doc?
I’ve attached the image above! Thanks for looking
We’ve also got this document here where we’re trying to get the name of the resident. I can’t get much out of AI Hub. Google translate does a reasonable job though

Hi
Are we using Form recognizer enabled for this project ?

I think this is a very good project for us to use for benchmarking and improving our langauge extraction, and for the confidence levels. In a lot of cases i’m getting 100% back but it doesn’t know the answer
For some of them, i’m getting much better results with GPT4, but we can’t use that in build

Yes I can get the person issued to, address and issuer etc. with advanced model (not sure if its picking the answer correctly).
However default model does not work in most cases.
